sen.j: 蓮如上人が京より北陸へ布教をする際、当村を含む街道を通り、村々を真言宗・日蓮宗等から改宗させたと記録されている。
sen.e: It is recorded that, when visiting the Hokuriku area from the capital to preach, Rennyo Shonin (a famous priest of Jodo-shu Sect in the Muromachi era) used a road that passed this village, and made many villagers in villages along the road change their religious sects from Shingon-shu Sect or Nichiren-shu Sect to his Jodoshin-shu Sect.
